comments.author: dlonie.6547
comments.body:
Item 36373, “Enchanted Broom” has weapon type ‘ToyTwoHanded’, but the docs says ‘TwoHandedToy’ is the proper identifier. Which should we use for parsing?

{
“chat_link” : “[&AgEVjgAA]”,
“default_skin” : 3241,

“min_power” : 0,
“secondary_suffix_item_id” : "",
“type” : “ToyTwoHanded”
},
“flags” : [
“AccountBound”,
“NoMysticForge”,
“NoSell”,
“NotUpgradeable”,
“AccountBindOnUse”
],
“game_types” : [ “PvpLobby”, “Activity”, “Wvw”, “Dungeon”, “Pve” ],
“icon” : “https://render.guildwars2.com/file/0B041363F2E8D23B9CF828C51A77B81F303626BA/534228.png”,

“name” : “Enchanted Broom”,

}
